---
title: "Welcome to THRIVE"
---

In order to show the resources page, we needed an index page. 
If you made it this far, head to the [resources page](resources.html).

GitHub will render whatever was put into the `docs` folder which RStudio
generated when we built the site.
By default, GitHub Pages will render whatever is in the top-level directory, 
but you can set it up to use `docs` instead.
